channel.title: Not able to sell back to a store pi
channel.description:
How can i make it where no matter what the item is you cant sell back to the store???
Basically if i buy a whip i want to make it where i cant sell the whip back at all..
how can i do that please help? i set the perameters to 0 and 0 from 2 and 2 and i can still sell it back?..
Any idea how to do it please help im pretty sure its a simple fix too.
